English.about:
Hello! I am %user% developed by <@126119057232625664> & <@280158289667555328>!
I was based on the Hypixel game "Murder Mystery"; I was being private for 2 months and 30 days (So long...) but I am public as of August 24th, 2017!
If you need help, Do **%prefix%help** or if you need my stats? Use **%prefix%stats**, Is there a bug? Use **%prefix%bug [report]** to report a bug!
English.lookindms: Please look in DMs! (If you don't see the DM, enable DMs)
English.fixgame: Attempting to fix the game... (Make sure you deleted all the channels Murder Mystery Bot made, also the role as well)
English.fixedgame: Successfully fixed the game! hopefully it works now ._.

You do not have permission to use this command!
You need the Game Hoster role!

English.manageroless: Sorry but you need the `MANAGE_ROLES` permission in order to use this command!
English.tjeoi: There is already a game going on!
English.murdergameregular:
Hello everyone! Lets play a game of Murder Mystery shall we? Lets find out who the murderer is! If you died, you will be DM'd this:
http://prntscr.com/gcaf7d
Once the user has put in their Last Will it will probably be announced to the server, if some admin is on the game and has the permission Administrator, Then that'll be cheating! (unless if they dont check the other channels ya mean?)
If you want to vote to kill someone, type %prefix%votehang and they will be voted to die!
That is the game! Hope Innocents Win!
English.gamestart: Game has started! GL (if you see a error, pls stop the game - if the game is buggy, contact FireMario211 by going on his server (%prefix%server))
English.murdergamemurderparty:
Hello everyone! Lets play a game of Murder Mystery shall we? Lets find out who the murderer is! **Everyone** is a Murderer...wait why is **Everyone** a murderer...? There is suppose to be one murderer...OH I remember! We are playing Murder Party Mode! That means EVERYONE is a murderer, and you should not trust ANYONE If you died, you will be DM'd this:
http://prntscr.com/ffad0j
Once the user has put in their Last Will it will probably be announced to the server, where there will be dead players in the chat, if some admin is on the game and has the permission Administrator, then it doesn't matter because everyone is a murderer
If you want to vote to kill someone, type %prefix%votehang and they will be voted to die!
That is the game!~~Hope Innocents Win!~~

English.modedoesntexistoutdated:
That mode doesn't exist!
Please use these categories:
```md
Regular - Classic Murder Mystery! (regular)

Murder Party - Everyone is a murderer! (murderparty)

Humans VS Bots - Added extra bots (not added yet)

Killer Mode - There is one Detective and Everyone is a murderer (not added yet)

Specialist Town - Everyone is either Murderer, Detective, healer, etc (not added yet)

2 birds 1 stone - 2 murds 1 detect Or 2 detect 1 murd (not added yet)
Faster mode - Classic murder mystery but the time is quicker (fastermode)

Time mode - In the day time, the Murderer can attack, but in the night they cant. (not added yet)

1v1 Mode - 1 Detective and 1 Murderer, ONLY 2 People can do this mode. (1v1)

Bot Murder Mode - At night the bot types %prefix%kill (random) (not added yet)

Rejected Roles Mode - A mode that contains (most of) the rejected roles (not added yet)

Unlimted Players Mode - Have more than 8 people? this is the mode for you! You can have an unlimited amount of players! (unlimitedmode)

Short roles - Want to play Murder Mystery with just 4 roles and 4 people? This is the mode! (shortroles)

Insane - Always day, murder can kill anytime and sheriff (insane)

Zombie Mode - A mode but with zombies that invade the world by infecting others (zombie)

Sandbox - You have access to everything. (sandbox)

Bot 1v1 - A mode that requires 2 players but in reality there are 3 since the bot joins, the bot is either a Murderer, Detective, or Healer. (bot1v1)

Thats all the modes
```

murderer.channel:
Hello there, You are a **Murderer**, You will try to kill as many people as you can! But remember, do not get caught! The Detective will try to find out who the Murderer is! There is also a Healer that can heal other people, so beware of that, the recommended thing to do is find the Detective and kill him/her. You can murder people by typing
%prefix%kill `@user`
Then someone will be murdered! But remember, it will be logged! It wont show your name though, remember not to talk in the public chat or else people will know who the murderer is! If you die, its game over! If you win, you win! Good luck murdering people... ;)
murderer.stabbady: `! But remember....They might be revived by the healer...

detective.channel:
Hello there, You are a **Detective**, You will try to find out who the Murderer is! The best option is to not trust anyone, Be sure to try your best to find out who the Murderer is, If you die, then there may be a new Detective, If you shoot someone, you cannot get your gun back, You've messed up buddy. If you die that means you can chat in the #general (or the main chat) (if the owner/admin has setup a thing where players with murder mystery role cant chat)
In order to search someone to see if they are murderer, Type %prefix%search `@user`
(or %prefix%search `(userid)`)
To shoot someone, type %prefix%shoot `@user`
(or %prefix%shoot `(userid)`)
But don't abuse your gun!
Thats all, hope you find out who the murderer is!
detective.shoot: You have shot <@%user%> and they were a **%role%**!
detective.sent: :skull: You have been shot by a **Detective**! :skull:
detective.sent2: was shot by the **Detective** and they were a **%role%**! :gun:

healer.channel:
Hello there, You are a **Healer**, You are a person that heals people that are dead! If you die, you cannot heal anyone anymore, Quick tip is try to not talk and say anything about your role. If you want to heal someone, just type
%prefix%heal `@user`
and you will be able to heal someone! Hope you avoid being murdered! Have a great game!
healer.wasteheal: You realize that you healed yourself, You have successfully wasted a first-aid kit. How terrible, heres another one *gives another one* Now dont use it on yourself!
healer.youhavehealed2:
!
They will be alive in the morning!
healer.dm: :angel: You have been revived by a **Healer**! You will be alive tomorrow morning. :angel:

jailor.channel:
Hello there, You are the **Jailor**, You will jail people every night and ask them questions. If you think the person is the murderer, feel free to type 
**%prefix%execute**
To execute the person, If you want to jail the person, type
%prefix%jail `@user`
To jail the person you want to interrogate someone, OR you can type
%prefix%jail `userid`
To jail the user but in a list that will be shown below, If you execute someone, Then it will be announced in the #murdergame, Hope you find out who the murderer is!
jailor.jailchannel: Hello, Welcome to **Jail**, this is where you have jailed people and you interrogate them by answering some questions, Also hello jailed person! Welcome to jail, If the Jailor thinks your suspicious, then you probably are going to be executed, If you murder the person, They might have a last will and then it will show the public chat the will and show who they jailed. Anyways, Don't try to get executed or else you'll end up like Shadow where he had his head cut off. Anyways, Hope you try to not get executed!
jailor.alreadyinjail: That person is already in jail!
jailor.havesss: :skull: You have been executed by the **Jailor** :skull:

radioperson.channel:
Hello! You are a **Radio Person** and you have the power to annonomously say to the public chat what YOU want to say. If you dont want to say anything, its fine buddy. If you want to broadcast to the public chat, Type
%prefix%broadcast (message)
To send a message to the #murdergame!
radioperson.broadcast2:
You have sent a global message to the news! Everyone has saw what you said!

On TV - SHOCKING/REGULAR NEWS
Hello there, I'm your host %username%, and today we are talking about something that happened!

assassin.channel: Hello there, You are an **Assassin**, You are a person that is trying to get your target killed, if your target is killed you earn $3 and you will get a new target to kill... Your main goal is to kill your target, The murderer will know who the Assassin is, but you do not know who the Murderer is, You will be DM'd on what your next target is. Make sure the murderer can assign a target AND can kill once per night (Money system coming soon)

You can infect people by typing %prefix%bite <@User/UserID>, but it will take around 1 day for them to turn into a zombie!

English.settings:
Hello there! Welcome to the **Settings Help Menu**! Here are the commands!

%prefix%settings locales set (language) - Sets your locales! (Used if you are a different language)
%prefix%settings locales - Shows the locales options!
%prefix%settings daytime <Length of day time in seconds> - This will set it for how long a day should last in-game!
%prefix%settings nighttime <Length of night time in seconds> - This will set it for how long a night should last in-game!
%prefix%settings category <Category / Category Channel Name> - Set the category of what Murder Mystery Bot should set the channels for the game!
%prefix%settings prefix <New Prefix> - Sets what the prefix is for the bot! (Default: 'mm!')

English.stabbed4: Someone tried to attack you! But you were in jail!

While its morning, chat with others to figure out who the murderer/assassin is!
English.help:
`Help Command`

***Regular Commands***
**%prefix%invite** - Invite Murder Mystery Bot to your server!
**%prefix%settings** - Change the settings for Murder Mystery Bot!
**%prefix%shardinfo**
**%prefix%server** - Shows you the invite to the Offical Murder Mystery Bot Server!
**%prefix%suggest** - Suggest something for the Bot! (Abusing this will result in a blacklist.)
**%prefix%globalgames** - The global games command!
**%prefix%friendinfo** <Account ID> - View info of your friend! (Global Games Command)
**%prefix%leave** - Leave a global games game (Ingame command)
**%prefix%profile** - Shows your profile status!
**%prefix%taunt** - Use a taunt! (Global Games Ingame command)

***Game Commands***
**%prefix%game** - Shows the detail of the game and how to play I guess
**%prefix%game rules** - Shows you the rules of the game!
**%prefix%game start** - Start a game!
**%prefix%game fixgame** - Attempts to fix the game.
**%prefix%game join** - Join a game!
**%prefix%game setupdata** - Add your guild data in our database!
**%prefix%game modecmds <Options>** - Change the game options! (Right now only used for Sandbox Mode)
**%prefix%game addhostrole <role name>** - Add your host role to the database!
**%prefix%game leave** - Leave the game!
**%prefix%game gamestart** - Start the game which will create all channels and setup roles, etc...
**%prefix%game stop** - Stop the game!

***Ingame Commands***
**%prefix%kill <@user>** - Kill a user! (Murderer Permission Needed)
**%prefix%assign <@user>** - Assign someone as a target for the assassin! (Murderer Permission Needed)
**%prefix%search <@user>** - Search the user to see if they are the murderer!
**%prefix%shoot <@user>** - Shoot a user if you think they are the murderer!
**%prefix%broadcast** - Broadcast a global message to the news!
**%prefix%votehang <@user>** - Vote to kill the person if you think they are suspicious!
**%prefix%jail <@user>** - Jail a person to interrogate them
**%prefix%execute <@user>** - Execute the user if they are suspicious...
**%prefix%heal <@user>** - Bring the user back from the dead!
**%prefix%lastwill <will>** - When you die or get hung, there will be a lastwill message to all the users to see before you actually die.
**%prefix%buy** <Item ID> - Have enough gold? Well you can buy an item!
**%prefix%item <Item ID> <@User (optional)>** - Bought an item? Well you can use your item!

***Bot made by FireMario211***
Version %version%
Please note that there may be bugs, if you see any, please type %prefix%bug (message)
English.shop:
Welcome to the **Shop**! Here you can buy things that will protect you or buy it for killing others that you might think is the murderer...
We use currency named "**Gold**", You can get 1 **Gold** every day unless you are dead or you are cursed.
**Items**:
%item%

In order to buy a item, type **%prefix%buy <Item ID>**
In order to use the Item, type **%prefix%item <Item ID>** Or if you have someone to use it on, type **%prefix%item <Item ID> <@User>**
English.darkshop:
Welcome to the **Dark Shop**! This shop is provided by the murderers who attempted to murder everyone in the Town... Here you can buy things that will protect you or buy it for killing others, or even explode the universe...
The Murderers and Assassins use currency named "**Dark Gold**", You can get 0.5 **Dark Gold** every day unless you are dead...Now if you want to get 1 **Dark Gold**, you can convert **Gold** into **Dark Gold**
**Items**:
%item%

In order to buy a item, type **%prefix%darkbuy <Item ID>**
In order to use the Item, type **%prefix%darkitem <Item ID>** Or if you have someone to use it on, type **%prefix%darkitem <Item ID> <@User>**

gamecmd.rules:
***RULES OF MURDER MYSTERY***
**These are the game rules of Murder Mystery, You must follow them or else you will get a punishment! (if your playing it on the MMBO server)**

:one: **Look at a channel if you have the permission Administrator** If you aren't playing the game, thats fine, but if you are playing and your an administrator and show people who the murderer is, you will get a punishment
**Punishment:** Warning if once, if twice then Timeout - 5 minutes
:two: **Gamethrowing** Gamethrowing isn't fun, If you get caught gamethrowing, like show that your detective and show who the murderer is, Also same as if you have an Administrator Permission.
**Punishment:** No warning, Timeout for 10 minutes
:three: **Cheating** If some how you exploited the bot, it isn't really fair to be cheating from the bot, if you crash the bot or somehow found away to get by the permissions, its a big no no. Another way of cheating is using a "Selfbot" to see the channel permissions
**Punishment:** Permanant Ban from the Game.

howtoactuallyplay.one:
```fix
> - Welcome to Murder Mystery! - <
```
This is a game where YOU the player try to find out who the Evils are or the Murderer!
There are a total of 8 roles, however the extra 1 is for a separate mode.
```md
## Main Roles ##
```
The first role is the **Murderer**, which kills one person each night. However, the **Detective** can search and find who the Murderer is then shoot them, or the **Jailor** can jail the murderer to find out no one has been murdered, and finally if you try to attack someone while they were in jail, the **Jailor** will find out exactly who tried to attack the person who was jailed and the person will be notified but not know who attacked. If you are the **Murderer**, be careful of who you try to kill. If someone asks for your role, try claiming that you are **Innocent**, or if someone is dead, try making sure people forget that person died and if someone asks for your role, say that you are that role. I would not advice claiming as a **Radio Person** as people will say to broadcast something to prove that you are, if either the **Jailor** is dead or the **Detective** is dead and everyone forgot, that they were dead, then if you claim that, everyone may listen to you as they are the most important roles. The **Murderer** also has a partner which is the **Assassin**, only the **Murderer** can assign targets for the **Assassin** who will try their best to get them killed. The **Assassin** does not know who the **Murderer** is and the **Murderer** cannot kill any of their partners.
howtoactuallyplay.two:
The second role is the **Detective**, where the **Detective** will try to find and shoot **All Evils**, but they cannot search or shoot people in jail,. If they attempt to shoot someone in jail, the **Jailor**, the **Jailor** will be notified that the person who was jailed was attempted to have been killed, same with the person who was in jail. If they attempt to search someone while they are in jail, they will not be able to search them since the person who the **Detective** is attempting to search is in jail.

The third role is the **Healer**, which can resurrect people if they were killed, murdered, shot, etc. However they cannot attempt to heal people in jail. The **Healer** is also a target for **Evils** as of now, the **Healer** can heal anyone without any limit, which can frustrate the **Murderer** or any evil roles.

The fourth role is the **Radio Person** who can broadcast anything anonymously at night.
howtoactuallyplay.three:
The firth role is the **Assassin**, which is the **Murderer**s partner, however the **Assassin** does not know who the **Murderer** is, but the **Murderer** knows who the **Assassin** is, the **Murderer** can assign targets for the **Assassin** to try and convince people to kill, if they succeed and the person dies, they will receive +3 gold, however if the person was voted to be killed, it will show that they were assigned as a target. The **Assassin** also cannot be killed by the **Murderer** as they are partners.

The sixth role is **Jailor**, which can jail people to interrogate them, if someone is jailed, they cannot use any role commands, this makes it convenient for the **Jailor** to see if anyone murders, or the **Murderer** can bait the **Jailor** to execute the person by not killing at all. The **Jailor** can decide if the person that they jailed should be executed or not, executing will reveal what their role was in the public chat and (not a feature yet) if they execute someone who was **Innocent** or wasn't evil, will not be able to execute anyone, but they can still jail people.
howtoactuallyplay.four:
```md
## Exclusive Roles ##
```The seventh role is the **Zombie** role, which is exclusive to the game mode; **Zombie Mode**, **Zombies** can bite people at night, however, it takes until the next 2 days for the person to become a **Zombie** if **Healer** doesn't heal the person in time. If the **Healer** does heal the person in time, they will not be turned into a **Zombie**, however if the person who was infected turns into a **Zombie**, their role will be revealed in the private zombie chat and they will not be able to use their normal role commands again, besides using the zombie role commands. They are also considered **Evil**.
howtoactuallyplay.five: Those are all the roles and the information about them, there are different strategies for each role which can determine how the game will play out for you and for the rest of the players. If you want to play Murder Mystery, it's recommended to have 6 or more people in order to play most of the other modes, else if you have a small group, as in 4 players or 3, then you can play short roles mode, bot 1v1, murder party, or 1v1 mode. The game is not meant to be played with 1 player.
howtoactuallyplay.six:
That is all the information you need to know about **Murder Mystery Bot** and the roles. As always...**Good luck**...

NOTE: If you need any help or found a bug, please contact <@126119057232625664> (FireMario211#2948), <@281397352177074177> (Noah's Gaming and More#6946) or <@553971625679126549> (Firee#7982) and we will try our best to fix it as possible!
**If you want to join our server, type mm!server**

:warning: ***PLEASE READ*** :warning:
If the game ends, all channels should be deleted and the role that the bot should be deleted **by the bot itself**, if not then that may be a bug and you should report it. If you see a channel that **you cannot delete** even though you have permission, you should reload your discord first as it is a **Discord Bug** that I and the Bot cannot fixed and is caused by the bot deleting the game channels, and can be resolved by just reloading your discord client.

:exclamation: ***Beware of Selfbots*** :exclamation:
**People can use selfbots to see the channel permissions and cheat, they can use an eval or some other source and then know exactly who the exact murderer is by channel permissions, If you encounter this, it is against the Discord Terms of Service/Guidelines and should report them. Or you can just ban/kick the person from the server. This is just my opinion if you don't want to report the user.**

***If you want to see the rules of the game, please type mm!game rules*** (Only for MMBO server)

I would also want to thank Noah for giving me the idea to make this bot and betterface for giving me gamemode ideas (In alpha version of the bot)
I would also like to thank you for inviting this bot and playing Murder Mystery with it!
